A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing. You no longer need to be trained in the Jedi ways or how to use the force\, simply turn on a light saber and you already qualify as a Jedi master. Princess Leia is able to survive deep space with no oxygen and flys like supergirl. I was hoping Disney would expand on the original story line and  leads us down an interesting creative path. Instead\, they have about 16 rebels left and a stable boy who is probably already a Jedi grand master.
